citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at
10:50-11:20am on 23-Jul-18.
Inspector tried to make contact at the residence, but no one answered. The inspector honked her horn and called
the number on file and left a message. The inspector waited in the driveway of the facility from 10:50-11:0 am. The
Inspector left a flyer in the door prior to departure from the facility.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at
10:50-11:20am on 23-Jul-18.
Inspector tried to make contact at the residence, but no one answered.  The inspector honked her horn and called
the number on file and left a message.  The inspector waited in the driveway of the facility from 10:50-11:0 am.  The
Inspector left a flyer in the door prior to departure from the facility.
